mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.code , t1.goods_id , t1.goods_name , t1.goods_price , t1.goods_color , t1.goods_size , t1.buyer_id , t1.buyer_name , t1.remark , t1.status , t1.pay_time , t1.cancel_time , t1.org_id , t1.dept_id , t1.sys_id , t1.secret_level , t1.sys_application_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 from orders t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CODE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.code}),'%')
and t1.GOODS_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.goodsId}),'%')
and t1.GOODS_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.goodsName}),'%')
and t1.GOODS_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.goodsPrice}),'%')
and t1.GOODS_COLOR like concat(concat('%',#{bean.goodsColor}),'%')
and t1.GOODS_SIZE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.goodsSize}),'%')
and t1.BUYER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.buyerId}),'%')
and t1.BUYER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.buyerName}),'%')
and t1.REMARK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.remark}),'%')
and t1.STATUS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.status}),'%')
and t1.PAY_TIME >= #{bean.payTimeBegin}
and t1.PAY_TIME <= #{bean.payTimeEnd}
and t1.CANCEL_TIME >= #{bean.cancelTimeBegin}
and t1.CANCEL_TIME <= #{bean.cancelTimeEnd}
and t1.ORG_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.orgId}),'%')
and t1.DEPT_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deptId}),'%')
and t1.SYS_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.sysId}),'%')
and t1.SECRET_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.secretLevel}),'%')
and t1.SYS_APPLICATION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.sysApplicationId}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.code , t1.goods_id , t1.goods_name , t1.goods_price , t1.goods_color , t1.goods_size , t1.buyer_id , t1.buyer_name , t1.remark , t1.status , t1.pay_time , t1.cancel_time , t1.org_id , t1.dept_id , t1.sys_id , t1.secret_level , t1.sys_application_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 from orders t1

or t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
or t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
or t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
or t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')

or t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
or t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
or t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.code , t1.goods_id , t1.goods_name , t1.goods_price , t1.goods_color , t1.goods_size , t1.buyer_id , t1.buyer_name , t1.remark , t1.status , t1.pay_time , t1.cancel_time , t1.org_id , t1.dept_id , t1.sys_id , t1.secret_level , t1.sys_application_id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 from orders t1 where t1.id = #{id}

where id = #{id} and version =#{version}

update orders set id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code =#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id =#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name =#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price =#{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_color =#{goodsColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_size =#{goodsSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_id =#{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_name =#{buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark =#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status =#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time =#{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cancel_time =#{cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, org_id =#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id =#{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_id =#{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secret_level =#{secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_application_id =#{sysApplicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date =#{creationDate}, last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=DATE}, attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=DATE}, attribute_11 =#{attribute11,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_12 =#{attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_13 =#{attribute13,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_14 =#{attribute14,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_15 =#{attribute15,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id} and version =#{version}

update.foreach: update orders set id =#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code =#{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id =#{item.goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name =#{item.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price =#{item.goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_color =#{item.goodsColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_size =#{item.goodsSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_id =#{item.buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_name =#{item.buyerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark =#{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status =#{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time =#{item.payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cancel_time =#{item.cancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, org_id =#{item.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id =#{item.deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_id =#{item.sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secret_level =#{item.secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_application_id =#{item.sysApplicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by =#{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date =#{item.creationDate}, last_updated_by =#{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_date =#{item.lastUpdateDate}, last_update_ip =#{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, attribute_01 =#{item.attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_02 =#{item.attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_03 =#{item.attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_04 =#{item.attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_05 =#{item.attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_06 =#{item.attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_07 =#{item.attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_08 =#{item.attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute_09 =#{item.attribute09,jdbcType=DATE}, attribute_10 =#{item.attribute10,jdbcType=DATE}, attribute_11 =#{item.attribute11,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_12 =#{item.attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_13 =#{item.attribute13,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_14 =#{item.attribute14,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute_15 =#{item.attribute15,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{item.id} and version =#{item.version};

mapper.update: update orders set status =#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update orders set status =1,payTime = SYSDATE() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update orders set status =2,cancelTime = SYSDATE() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ORDERS
where STATUS = ${bean.status}
